SVGRectElementWidth.summary: The width read-only property of the interface describes the horizontal size of an SVG rectangle as a . The length is in user coordinate system units along the x-axis. Its syntax is the same as that for <length>.

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGElement("rect")}} element's {{SVGAttr("width")}} presentational attribute. The CSS width property takes precedence over the SVG width presentational attribute, so the value may not reflect the elements actual size. The default value is 0.
